title: Cheetah3D [v6.0]
description:
Cheetah3D is a powerful and easy to learn 3D modeling, rendering and animation application which was developed from the ground up for OS X. So jump right into the world of Computer Generated Imaging. Create 3D artwork for your next iPhone game or make your first animated character. 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Cheetah3D 6.0 adds tons of new powerful features, like the integration of the Bullet physics engine, Isosurfaces or improved iBooks Author support so we can only list some of them here: 

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Simulation of rigid body and soft body dynamics using the industry proven Bullet physics engine 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Seamless integration of the physics engine with interactive realtime preview 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Simulation baking for very complex scenes 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Isosurfaces (Metaballs) with support for balls, vertices, particles and splines 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Keying (animation) of mesh vertices and spline control points 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ New parametric object types like capsule, fractal, Isosurface, line
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ New mesh modifiers like smooth, shell or crumple 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Global scene search field. You can now search all objects and materials interactively 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Improved sweep and bevel tools 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Even more hotkeys and customizable colors 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Improved Collada export (iBooks Authors compatible) 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Upgraded to the latest FBX SDK (v2012.2) 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Greatly extended Javascript API offers access to animation data (F-Curves) 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Support for OS X Lion features, such as full screen mode
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ And much, much more. In total over 200 new features, enhancements and optimizations!
